challenges.name: 1p Wave 20 Unarmed
challenges.description: Reach wave 20 with only 1 player while completely unarmed
challenges.rules: At the end of the game, your teammate must have 0 points and damage, and you must complete this entire challenge without picking up any weapon or gadget

challenges.name: 2p High Waves
challenges.description: Reach the highest wave that you can with 2 players!
challenges.rules: If players switch doors at any point after wave 25, this challenge doesn't count

challenges.name: 2p Greatsword
challenges.description: Reach the highest wave that you can with 2 players, but both players can only attack using the Greatsword weapon!
challenges.rules: If players switch doors at any point after wave 25, this challenge doesn't count. Gadgets are still allowed.

challenges.name: 2p Hammer
challenges.description: Reach the highest wave that you can with 2 players, but both players can only attack using the Hammer weapon!
challenges.rules: If players switch doors at any point after wave 25, this challenge doesn't count. Gadgets are still allowed.

challenges.name: 2p Locked In Part 2
challenges.description: Reach wave 26 with 2 players with both players only using the same light attack, and the same weapon
challenges.rules: You may use other attacks so long as they do not inflict any damage (EG recovering back to the stage)

challenges.name: 2p Assortment of Tools
challenges.description: Reach wave 26 with 2 players while killing gruagach with a different weapon each time
challenges.rules: A weapon can count as any normal weapon, unarmed, or any gadget

challenges.name: 3p Centralized
challenges.description: Reach Wave 26 with 3 players while only touching the long middle platform
challenges.rules: Before any demons are killed, all 3 players must jump off any other platforms they may spawn atop; you may kill demons while airborne, but you may only land on the middle platform (you may phase through other platforms as long as you do not land on them)

challenges.name: 4p Fair World
challenges.description: Reach Wave 26 with 4 players with each player having exactly 1 kill on Gruagach
challenges.rules: Each player must kill Gruagach exactly 1 time, which means that there must be one round where Gruagach SDs

challenges.name: speedrun: The Ultimate Trio
challenges.description: Reach wave 26 with 3 players within 6:00 or less

challenges.name: 1p Ricochet
challenges.description: Kill a red demon with a spikeball after bouncing it off a mine
challenges.rules: Can be completed on any player amount, but is only completed by the person who got the kill, not everyone in the game

challenges.name: 2p Hitless Waves
challenges.description: Reach the highest wave that you can with 2 players with your door remaining hitless!
challenges.rules: Unlike the normal hitless challenge, this challenge only applies to your door, so if your teammates door gets hit, but yours is still hitless, you're still elligible for completing the challenge. If players switch doors at any point after wave 25, this challenge doesn't count. Demons who despawn once they reach the door without dealing damage count as taking damage

challenges.name: 2p Sword
challenges.description: Reach the highest wave that you can with 2 players, but both players can only attack using the Sword weapon!
challenges.rules: If players switch doors at any point after wave 25, this challenge doesn't count. Gadgets are still allowed.

challenges.name: 2p Orb
challenges.description: Reach the highest wave that you can with 2 players, but both players can only attack using the Orb weapon!
challenges.rules: If players switch doors at any point after wave 25, this challenge doesn't count. Gadgets are still allowed.

challenges.name: 2p Cutting it Close
challenges.description: Reach wave 26 with 2 players with both doors open
challenges.rules: A door still counts as open if it's visually closed but there are no particles coming out of it

challenges.name: 2p Survival
challenges.description: Survive for 15 minutes with 2 players without going past wave 40

challenges.name: 4p Diversity
challenges.description: Reach Wave 26 with 4 players with 8 separate weapons in 1 game
challenges.rules: No 2 players can play characters that share any weapons

challenges.name: speedrun: Double Trouble
challenges.description: Reach wave 11 with 2 players within 2:00 or less
